entity_name: MX-RL-Pro LCD Digital Tube Rotator, Horizontal
description:
•  LCD displays speed and time

• Adjustable speed range of 10 to 70 rpm

•  Provides gentle but effective rolling and mixing

• Can be used in cold rooms or incubators

• Wide variety of Disk accessories and Rotisserie accessories available
